messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
9-1-1, please send fire and medical.
Pardon me?
Somebody got shot.
Somebody got shot?
Yeah, out here in Mountain Dell.
Okay, can you tell me more about what's happening?
They're still shooting. Oh my god, they're still shooting.
Are they shooting at someone?
Yes, and a neighbor ran over and said the guy with them is shooting.
Are they trying to shoot at them?
No, I'm scared.
Okay, ma'am, I need you to take a deep breath, okay? I'm already getting help started. Please take a deep breath and tell me what's going on.
Mountain Dell Road. I'm so scared.
Who is it that is shooting?
Um, I don't know.
Ma'am, I need to know who's shooting.
The lady is coming over, and I'm afraid to go outside.
Don't go outside. Do you know who is shooting?
No, I don't know.
Okay, someone has been shot?
I don't know. I can't go out. I'm afraid.
Who's shooting?
It's just the neighbor. She's in my driveway, but she's yelling to call for an ambulance.
She's the one that shot someone?
Her boyfriend shot someone.
Her boyfriend shot someone?
Yes, she said to get an ambulance quick.
Okay, we have help coming. So did he intentionally shoot someone?
I think so.
But you don't know why or who has been shot?
No, I just know her son ran over and now she's parked in our driveway.
So the female neighbor ran over, but her boyfriend did the shooting?
Well, no, her son did at first, but then her boyfriend is the one that shot.
Okay, do you know their names?
Her boyfriend is Brian.
Brian is shot. Who did the shooting?
I don't know who did the shooting. She just said get an ambulance.
Okay, is there an active shooter out there right now?
I don't know anything. She just needs an ambulance.
Do you know where he was shot?
No, I don't know.
Are they all out in your driveway right now?
Yes, they're in their car. I can't see any gun.
What kind of car are they in?
It's an aqua blue car.
Is it a sedan?
Yes, I think so. They just need an ambulance quick.
Help is on the way, but we can't approach until we know it's safe. Is anyone still shooting?
I don't know. The people in the car don't have a gun.
Okay, so someone at the house across the street has a gun, but the people in the car are safe?
Yes, no weapons in the car. Just send an ambulance.
Do you know why her boyfriend was shot?
No, she just said get an ambulance quick.
We're sending help, but we need to know what else is going on. Who else is involved?
I don't know. It's just the three of them that live there.
Can you tell me the name of the victim?
Brian, I don't know his last name.
Do you know anything about his injuries?
No, I just know the girlfriend is in her car in my driveway.
What's the girlfriend's name?
I don't know her last name.
Do you know if the son is in the car?
I think it's just Brian in the car.
What's the son's name?
I don't know. I just know there's no gun in the car.
Okay, we're sending help, but please stay inside and safe.
Thank you, it's just so scary.
I understand, ma'am. Help is on the way.
